channel.title: Authors on David Davó's dev log
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on David Davó's dev log

item.description: Research assistant that just finished its Master’s in Artificial Intelligence at the Politechnic University of Madrid. Researching about online communities in blockchain at the Complutense University of Madrid since 2021. In 2022 I received the BsC in Computer Science at that same university, and in 2024 a MsC in Artificial Intelligence at the Politechnic University of Madrid.
item.content:encoded: Research assistant that just finished its Master’s in Artificial Intelligence at the Politechnic University of Madrid. Researching about online communities in blockchain at the Complutense University of Madrid since 2021. In 2022 I received the BsC in Computer Science at that same university, and in 2024 a MsC in Artificial Intelligence at the Politechnic University of Madrid.
